description: A semiconductor fabrication plant uses an AI agent to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules. The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify patterns indicative of impending malfunctions.  The goal is to minimize downtime and maximize production efficiency.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned equipment downtime in the wafer fabrication facility by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance based on sensor data analysis.
constraints: maintenance_window_constraints: must adhere to planned shutdown windows
